thread.title: Petrobras Unit Fuel-Tank Blast Kills Two Workers
thread.title_full: Petrobras Unit Fuel-Tank Blast Kills Two Workers - WSJ

author: Rogerio Jelmayer
title: Petrobras Unit Fuel-Tank Blast Kills Two Workers
text:
SAO PAULO--An explosion Wednesday at a fuel-unloading terminal used by a unit of Brazil’s state-run oil company, Petroleo Brasileiro SA, killed two workers, the company said.
The two workers worked for a subcontractor employed by Petrobras Distribuidora, the company’s fuel distribution unit.
Petrobras Distribuidora said it is... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
